'''''Fungi Buster''''' is a [[Daily Commission]] that occurs in various areas of [[Sumeru]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|A group of angry Fungi has been sighted out in the wild, threatening the safety of nearby areas. Defeat them and put an end to this problem.}}
#Defeat the Fungi (0/X)

==Rewards==
{{Commission Rewards|full}}

==Enemies==
* [[Ardravi Valley]], between [[Port Ormos]] and [[Apam Woods]]
** Initial enemies: {{Enemy List|Winged Cryoshroom; Whirling Electro Fungus*3}}
** Reinforcements (spawn after 2 enemies have been defeated): {{Enemy List|Floating Dendro Fungus*3}}
*: <gallery>
Fungi Buster Ardravi Valley Start Location.png|Starting location
</gallery>
* [[Ashavan Realm]], northeast of [[Apam Woods]]

*: <gallery>

</gallery>
